Plot: A young woman suffering from Parkinson's befriends a drug rep working for Pfizer in 1990s Pittsburgh.
Title: Love & Other Drugs
Writer: Charles Randolph (screenplay), Edward Zwick (screenplay), Marshall Herskovitz (screenplay), Jamie Reidy (book)
Actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Anne Hathaway, Oliver Platt, Hank Azaria
Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.
